name: Flick Field Goal 20
description:
Become the King of Football as the Ultimate Placekicker in a unique Field Goal Challenge from the creators of Marshawn Lynch Pro Football and Flick Quarterback.

Can you kick the ball far enough to land yourself in the History Books as a Field Goal Legend?

FLICK TO KICK
Swipe up and shoot the ball through the football goal post, gain combos and rack up a mammoth high score. How accurate are your shots?

ADDICTIVE CHALLENGES
Kick field goals and punts with perfect accuracy across three exciting unique challenges. As you progress, unlock rewards, free boosts, cheerleaders, fireworks and much more!

STUNNING GRAPHICS
Highly detailed graphics with ultra-realistic wind and weather effects.

TRAIN, CUSTOMISE AND PLAY
Take it to the end-zone with training mode hours of gameplay. From daily rewards and skill unlocks to player and ball upgrades. Are you ready to kick the cheeseburger and win the big game?!
